blogs.title: First blog
blogs.body: Hello, guys, this is the first blog on this site. Done with making it and looking forward to upgrading it and adding more features in the future.
blogs.author: Hundal

blogs.title: Christmas Blog
blogs.body: Merry Christmas and Happy new year. May you have a successful year ahead. Enjoy the holiday season !!!
blogs.author: Arya Bhatt

blogs.title: Books
blogs.body: Hey guys, let's share the new reads. I am currently reading A Promised Land by Barack Obama. Really excited to finish it. Suggest me some non-fiction books that I shall start after this one. Thanks in advance 😊😊
blogs.author: Ali

blogs.title: GItHub
blogs.body: Hello, guys check my GitHub profile. I am attaching the link https://github.com/Angad-Hundal and suggest me ideas for my next project.
blogs.author: Angad

blogs.title: Mental Health 😊
blogs.body: Hey guys, I just want to say that focus on your mental health it is very important. Try to be calm and share your problems. It is very important to stay healthy both physically and mentally 👍👍
blogs.author: Puzo
